Topic.Title: Bill Clinton Balanced the Budget... Obama is Bankrupting America

Message.Msg: and then we have the glorious 4th estate , which , in the 20th century has sunk to a nadir .... the press likes to make a big deal out of the "Clinton Surplus" .... so what ???? surplus , it's like a "strong dollar" ... sure sounds patriotic , yet it can be toxic .. same for budget surplus ... look at Japan .. ever since their stock market blew up , they went into a shell , the yen has strengthened , they have surplusses and a miserable economy that cannot climb out of a deflationary hole ....
